RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui doutorado em Economia por Yale (2011). Entre 2011 e 2014, foi professor assistente da Toulouse School of Economics. Atualmente professor titular da FGV/EPGE. Sua pesquisa concentra-se em Economia da Informao e em jogos dinmicos.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: He received his Phd in Economics from Yale in 2011. He was an assistant professor at TSE until 2014, when he moved to FGV/EPGE. His research focuses on information economics and dynamic games.
